name: minesweeper-score-server
description: Fastify API server for Minesweeper scores (Postgres + JWT)

JWT_SECRET.description: Secret used to sign JWTs (generate a long random value).

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Google OAuth client ID used to verify Google ID tokens server-side.

FACEBOOK_APP_ID.description: Facebook App ID used to verify Facebook access tokens.

FACEBOOK_APP_SECRET.description: Facebook App Secret used to verify Facebook access tokens.

DATABASE_SSL.description: Whether to enable SSL for Postgres connections.
